headline: GPN to Sell Payroll Business for $1.1Bn, Boosts Focus on Core Operations
summary: Global Payments plans to divest Payroll business to Acrisure for $1.1 billion, sharpening focus on core operations and boosting shareholder returns with post-sale proceeds.
